description:
Replacement pads for your XTR, XT, SLX, Deore and Alfine disc brake systems.

  • Metal pads are hard-wearing and powerful
  • Compatible with Shimano® BR-M985, BR-M8000, BR-M785, BR-M7000, BR-M675, BR-M615, BR-S700 as well as any other Shimano calipers that uses G Type pads
name: Shimano G04S Metal Disc Brake Pads
